name: Roll Playing Game (ElevenStorms)
description:
As a Maneki-neko, you bring luck and fortune to yourself and those around you, unfortunately, your powers do not separate friend from foe.

This is a rather simple turn-based combat system, with the core gimmick being the Fortune and Blight options. With Fortune improving damage rolls and crit rate for both you and your enemies, and Blight doing the opposite.

The top of your battle menu displays your current luck stat at all times- this is also your % crit rate.

GAMEPLAY:
This game is played using your mouse.
Attack: Click attack, click your target. It's nothing special, but it is your only way to take your foes down. Improves with luck.
Soothe: Restore some health and reduce incoming damage. Improves with luck.
Fortune: Increases luck for all actors in battle, improving their damage rolls and crit rate.
Blight: Decreases luck for all actors in battle, lessening their damage rolls and crit rate.

(target yourself with an attack for an.. unintentional easter egg?)

CREDITS:
The battle scene uses a modified background made by jkjkke
https://opengameart.org/content/background-5
All other art assets are self-made


Never made turn based combat before. It was more work than I thought it'd be, so it's rather barebones, but it was a lot of fun!
